The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. George Fox, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 54580;First DistrictMay 10, 1971.Gerald W. Getty, Public Defender, of Chicago, (Shelvin Singer and James J. Doherty, Assistant Public Defenders, and Ronald D. Menaker Senior Law Student, of counsel,) for appellant.Edward V. Hanrahan, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, (Robert A. Novelle and Nicholas De John, Assistant State’s Attorneys, of counsel,) for the People.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE LYONS.
